source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a nighttime, high-angle shot of a futuristic, stylized cityscape. The central focus is a tall, sleek skyscraper with a curved design, illuminated by bright blue lights along its edges and a pattern of glowing white triangles on its facade. The surrounding city is dark, with glowing white lines tracing paths like roads or a digital network around other silhouetted buildings.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a nighttime, high-angle shot of a futuristic, stylized cityscape. The central focus is a tall, sleek skyscraper with a curved design, illuminated by bright blue lights along its edges and a pattern of glowing white triangles on its facade. The surrounding city is dark, with glowing white lines tracing paths like roads or a digital network around other silhouetted buildings.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the visual elements of the scene but fails to mention the primary motion in the video. The instruction requires a description of the subject's motion, and in this case, the only movement is the camera's. The caption should be revised to include a description of the camera's slow, high-angle, orbiting pan from left to right around the central skyscraper.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The camera performs a slow, high-angle, orbiting pan from left to right around a central skyscraper in a futuristic, stylized cityscape at night. The tall, sleek building has a curved design, illuminated by bright blue lights along its edges and a pattern of glowing white triangles on its facade. The surrounding city is dark, with glowing white lines tracing paths like roads or a digital network around other silhouetted buildings.
